mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes and compress large assets for faster mobile load times.
loadingSpeedTip: Implement browser caching and reduce server response times.
seoOptimizationTip: Enhance meta descriptions and include alt text for all images.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation by adding a sticky menu for better accessibility.
bookingFlowTip: Integrate booking functionality directly on the main domain to streamline the process.
tips: Improve booking integration to retain users on the same domain.

Regularly test and optimize page load speed.
